website_summaries.verdict: Slip this durable hook over the top of your umbrella pole to keep towels, shirts, and even lighter beach bags out of the sand.
pros: Supports large and small items like beach bags, towels, cameras, and sunglasses
Keeps your items from getting wet and sandy
Fits umbrella poles up to 1.5 inches in diameter
cons: Does not work with crank umbrellas, only with ones you raise manually

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how well it works because I could ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well it works because I could not get it on my umbrella. I may have missed something in the description of the hook, but my umbrella has a crank and it is in the way so that the hook cannot be installed. It appears that the hook will only work for umbrellas that are raised manually (no crank).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and was simply amazed by the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased an umbrella anchor from Ultimate Summit recently for an upcoming beach trip, and was simply amazed by the quality of the product. Saw on their Amazon page that they offered this product as well (frankly, I had never seen anything like this before, but thought "what a great idea!"). This product did not disappoint either. Very high quality/durable. Such a great idea. Now my wife won't be complaining about sand in her bag at the beach! Just a very convenient product.
customer_reviews.author: Regal Industrial

customer_reviews.title: I used the hooks on a hot tub, not ...
customer_reviews.text: I used the hooks on a hot tub, not an umbrella. The cover lifter is made of 1" steel tubing. We needed something to hold our towels nearby. The tubing was a little small but the hook tightened OK. This is a permanent installation so I secured it further with silicon injected around the top & bottom. The only improvement for this application might be a hook optimized for smaller tubing. Let me know if you want a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ron Sheahan

customer_reviews.title: A must.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool accessory. We love the beach, but we are always very nervous about taking phones and other devices out there with us. Now we can put our phones in a dry bag, and hang them. Our cameras and Bluetooth speakers also have straps for hanging. Not only are they safe from water and sand, they are kept up hi under the umbrella so they are always shaded.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Simon

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This a great hook to hang things when you put up the umbrella it is totally adjustable and can be easily added or moved as needed. I would happily recommend this item. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B de Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Such a great gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Had the same one last year and lost it. Can't wait for the sun to come out so we can use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Caiola

customer_reviews.title: The hook is easy to use and holds strong to the pole
customer_reviews.text: Was worried these hooks may not hold tight especially with items that may be heavier, but thankfully I was wrong. The hook is easy to use and holds strong to the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This didn't stay put on my umbrella, and it was really horribly made. It wasn't worth the cost of returning it, and wound up in the trash. Boo.

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I wish it uses rubber padding for more grip and so it won't easily slip down the umbrella pole.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Won't "battle test" it until next week, but fits umbrella pole perfectly (adjustable) and solidly made.

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Holds many items away from the sand. Easy to use and remove from umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easily slid on my umbrella. Held my wet towel, wet shirt and other misc. items nicely. I didn't try it with anything heavy so no five stars but for the price I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit no matter what
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for when we went to the beach. They will slip onto any pole and tighten to fit. Very easy and quick to use. We were able to hang the things we did not want to get sand in and keep them out of the sun.

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory for our beach umbrella. Easy to install and convenient. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Hook
customer_reviews.text: Used it once so far, attached to umbrella with ease and locked it in place. This was useful for hanging our towels, and in the wind they stayed on.

product_meta.title: Ultimate Summit Umbrella Hook for Towels and Beach Bags
product_meta.description: Keep your items out of the sand, and keep them dry with the Ultimate Summit umbrella hook. It's 4 hook design made out of a rugged polypropylene prevents corrosion under the salty and sandy conditions of the beach. It can also be used for your patio umbrella as well! The hook is adjustable and easy to install, to keep your belongings out of the sand and damp conditions on the ground. It's effortless to install, and fits all standard umbrellas! Throw it in your beach bag, and enjoy fun in the sun while your items stay dry, out of the sand, and in the shade! ORDER YOUR ULTIMATE SUMMIT UMBRELLA HOOK TODAY!!!
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY ULTIMATE SUMMIT UMBRELLA HOOK: is made out of strong polypropylene and designed to keep your items off the ground. The durable construction provides extra support for larger products like a full beach bag, digital cameras, and even smaller items like sunglasses!

EASY INSTALLATION OF THE ULTIMATE SUMMIT UMBRELLA HOOK: allows you to get all of your stuff organized quickly, so you can join your family and friends quicker. It keeps your belongings up high so won't have to worry about getting them wet and sandy!
ULTRA LIGHT DESIGN: keeps your bags light as you carry your items to and from the beach!
UNIVERSAL DESIGN: allows you to adjust for a snug fit to any standard umbrella!
ADJUSTABLE: to allow you to choose how high or low you would like to place the umbrella hook!
